# facenet: Face recognition using torch

<!-- badges: start -->
[![Lifecycle: experimental](https://img.shields.io/badge/lifecycle-experimental-orange.svg)](https://www.tidyverse.org/lifecycle/#experimental)
<!-- badges: end -->

Face recognition using torch. This is a port from original [Tim Esler's 'facenet-pytorch' implementation](https://github.com/timesler/facenet-pytorch) to R.

## Installation

Not yet on CRAN.

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("curso-r/facenet")
```

PS: Super early devel stage and still not working!
